trans-unit.source: Represents a peer located by the "People Near Me" infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Representa um par localizado pela infraestrutura “Pessoas ao meu Redor”.

trans-unit.source: An instance of this class cannot be created directly.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância dessa classe não pode ser criada diretamente.

trans-unit.source: Instead, a reference to the peers "near" the calling peer is obtained by using the static <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.GetPeersNearMe%2A> method to return a collection of nearby peers.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, uma referência para os pares "próximo" o par de chamada é obtida usando estático <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.GetPeersNearMe%2A> método para retornar uma coleção de pares próximos.

trans-unit.source: A peer represented by a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> object is not necessarily in the calling peer's address book.
trans-unit.target: Um ponto representado por um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> objeto não é necessariamente no catálogo de endereços do par chamada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância padrão da classe <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" />.

trans-unit.source: The serialization destination associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" />.
trans-unit.target: O destino de serialização associado ao <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance with the associated parameters required for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> com os parâmetros associados necessários para a serialização.

trans-unit.source: Generates a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> from a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object and associates it with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Gera um <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> e associa-o ao <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Generates a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object and associates it with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Gera um <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> do objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> e associa-o ao <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> object associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The Collaboration infrastructure has failed to create and associate a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.
trans-unit.target: A infraestrutura de Colaboração falhou ao criar e associar um <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> ao <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.

trans-unit.source: The display name assigned to the newly created contact.
trans-unit.target: O nome de exibição atribuído ao contato recém-criado.

trans-unit.source: The <c>nickname</c> to assign to the newly created contact.
trans-unit.target: O <c>nickname</c> a ser atribuído ao contato recém-criado.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress" /> object that specifies the email address to assign to the newly created contact.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress" /> especifica o endereço de email a ser atribuído ao contato recém-criado.

trans-unit.source: Generates a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> with the associated descriptive parameters from the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object and associates it with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Gera um <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> com os parâmetros descritivos associados do objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> e associa-o ao <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> object associated with a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> containing descriptive parameters.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> associado a um <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> que contém parâmetros descritivos.

trans-unit.source: The Collaboration infrastructure has failed to create or update a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.
trans-unit.target: A infraestrutura de Colaboração falhou ao criar e atualizar um <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> ao <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> object that specifies the endpoint associated with the peer.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> que especifica o ponto de extremidade associado ao par.

trans-unit.source: Generates a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object from the provided <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Gera um objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> do <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> fornecido.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: If the provided <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> does not map to a signed-in peer on the same subnet, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se fornecido <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> não é mapeado para um par conectado na mesma sub-rede, `null` será retornado.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="peerEndPoint" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="peerEndPoint" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The referenced <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.EndPoint" /> specifies <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.EndPoint" /> referenciado especifica <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Set to <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Definido como <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> e libera opcionalmente os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Compara a instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> com o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: A instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> a ser testada quanto à igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Compara o <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> com a instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance provided has matching data, else <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Retornará <see langword="true" /> se a instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> fornecida tiver dados correspondentes; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="other" /> argument is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O argumento <paramref name="other" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The object to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser testado quanto à igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Compara a instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> com o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance provided has matching data, else <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Retornará <see langword="true" /> se a instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> fornecida tiver dados correspondentes; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instances are considered equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se as instâncias <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> especificadas são consideradas iguais.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instances provided have matching data, else <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Retornará <see langword="true" /> se as instâncias <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> fornecidas tiverem dados correspondentes; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para a instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" />.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code used to compare instances of this type.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash de inteiro com sinal de 32 bits usado para comparar instâncias deste tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> a ser preenchido com dados.

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: O destino da serialização.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with the data required to serialize the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" />.
trans-unit.target: Popula uma <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> com os dados necessários para serializar o <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A derived type must call the base type <see cref="M:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Um tipo derivado deve chamar o método <see cref="M:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> do tipo base.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the application, object, and presence data relevant to a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Especifica os dados do aplicativo, do objeto e de presença relevantes para uma instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" />.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a network operation to retrieve the application, object and presence data specific to a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação de rede para recuperar os dados do aplicativo, do objeto e de presença específicos a uma instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" />.

trans-unit.source: The data retrieved is stored in a cache accessed by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> methods as well as the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os dados recuperados são armazenados em um cache acessado pelo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A> e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> métodos, bem como a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.InternalRefreshData%2A> method only needs to be used if the caller is not subscribed to the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.InternalRefreshData%2A> método só precisa ser usado se o chamador não está inscrito especificado <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, ou <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.

trans-unit.source: This method blocks additional calls until the network operation is complete and the cache has been updated.
trans-unit.target: Esse método bloqueia chamadas adicionais até que a operação de rede for concluída e o cache foi atualizado.

trans-unit.source: The caller is not required to sign in with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method or via a user interface in to complete this operation successfully.
trans-unit.target: O chamador não é necessário para entrar com o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> método ou por meio de uma interface do usuário para concluir esta operação com êxito.

trans-unit.source: Sends an invitation to join a peer collaboration application to a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Envia um convite para ingressar um aplicativo de colaboração ponto a ponto em um par remoto.

trans-unit.source: Sends an invitation to join a peer collaboration application to a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Envia um convite para ingressar um aplicativo de colaboração ponto a ponto em um par remoto.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse" /> object containing the relevant <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponseType" /> value specified by the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse" /> que contém o valor <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponseType" /> relevante especificado pelo par remoto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> specified by the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection" /> is <see langword="null" /> or has a value count of '0' associated endpoints.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> especificado pela <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection" /> é <see langword="null" /> ou tem uma contagem de valor igual a “0” pontos de extremidade associados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> has not been associated with the current peer-to-peer application.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> não foi associado ao aplicativo ponto a ponto atual.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the relevant Peer Collaboration application represented by a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o aplicativo relevante de Colaboração de Ponto a Ponto representado por uma instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.

trans-unit.source: A message to send to the remote peer along with the application invitation.
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem a ser enviada para o par remoto com o convite do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The message can be no more than 255 Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem não pode ter mais de 255 caracteres Unicode.

trans-unit.source: A user defined data blob to associate with the invitation.
trans-unit.target: Um blob de dados definido pelo usuário a ser associado ao convite.

trans-unit.source: Size is limited to 16K (16,384 bytes).
trans-unit.target: O tamanho é limitado a 16K (16.384 bytes).

trans-unit.source: Sends an invitation to join a peer collaboration application to a remote peer that includes data that describes or specifies the application invite.
trans-unit.target: Envia um convite para ingressar um aplicativo de colaboração ponto a ponto em um par remoto que inclui dados que descrevem ou especificam o convite do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse" /> object containing the relevant <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponseType" /> value specified by the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse" /> que contém o valor <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponseType" /> relevante especificado pelo par remoto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="applicationToInvite" /> argument specifies <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O argumento <paramref name="applicationToInvite" /> especifica <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="applicationToInvite" /> argument specifies an empty <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: O argumento <paramref name="applicationToInvite" /> especifica um <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> vazio.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> specified by the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection" /> is <see langword="null" /> or has a value count of '0' associated endpoints.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> especificado pela <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection" /> é <see langword="null" /> ou tem uma contagem de valor igual a “0” pontos de extremidade associados.

trans-unit.source: Receives an invitation response from a peer regarding joining a peer collaboration application.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma resposta de convite de um par sobre o ingresso em um aplicativo de colaboração ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: User-defined object passed to the callback of the asynchronous operation for identification.
trans-unit.target: Objeto definido pelo usuário passado para o retorno de chamada da operação assíncrona para identificação.

trans-unit.source: This required parameter must be unique across all asynchronous invitation operations still in-progress.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro necessário deve ser exclusivo em todas as operações de convite assíncronas ainda em andamento.

trans-unit.source: Receives an invitation response from a peer regarding joining a peer collaboration application.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma resposta de convite de um par sobre o ingresso em um aplicativo de colaboração ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="userToken" /> argument specifies <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O argumento <paramref name="userToken" /> especifica <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object does not specify a valid <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> não especifica um <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> válido.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the relevant Peer Collaboration application information represented by a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Especifica as informações de aplicativo relevantes de Colaboração de Ponto a Ponto representadas por um objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />.

trans-unit.source: A message to send to the remote peer along with the application invitation.
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem a ser enviada para o par remoto com o convite do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The message can be no more than 255 Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem não pode ter mais de 255 caracteres Unicode.

trans-unit.source: A user defined data blob to associate with the invitation.
trans-unit.target: Um blob de dados definido pelo usuário a ser associado ao convite.

trans-unit.source: Size is limited to 16K.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho é limitado a 16K.

trans-unit.source: User-defined object passed to the callback of the asynchronous operation for identification.
trans-unit.target: Objeto definido pelo usuário passado para o retorno de chamada da operação assíncrona para identificação.

trans-unit.source: This required parameter must be unique across all asynchronous invitation operations still in-progress.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro necessário deve ser exclusivo em todas as operações de convite assíncronas ainda em andamento.

trans-unit.source: Receives an invitation response from a peer regarding an invitation to a peer collaboration application.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma resposta de convite de um par sobre um convite para um aplicativo de colaboração ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="applicationToInvite" /> argument specifies <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O argumento <paramref name="applicationToInvite" /> especifica <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="userToken" /> argument specifies <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O argumento <paramref name="userToken" /> especifica <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint specified by <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de extremidade especificado pelo <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> não foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="applicationToInvite" /> argument specifies an empty <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: O argumento <paramref name="applicationToInvite" /> especifica um <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> vazio.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the Nickname of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o Apelido do objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the Nickname of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o apelido do <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If a contact is generated from a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> object, the associated contact Nickname is populated with this property value.
trans-unit.target: Se um contato é gerado a partir um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> , e o contato associado apelido é preenchido com o valor da propriedade do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Event data contained in a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.RefreshDataCompletedEventArgs" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Dados de evento contidos em uma instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.RefreshDataCompletedEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Signals the <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Sinaliza o evento <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted" />.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Classes que herdam desta classe podem substituir esse método para executar mais tarefas quando a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: This method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Esse método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: In a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s implementation of this method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a implementação da classe base do método para que os delegados registrados recebem o evento.

trans-unit.source: Signaled when a new <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance is found, no longer available, or the associated <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> object information has changed.
trans-unit.target: Sinalizado quando uma nova instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> é encontrada, não está mais disponível ou as informações de objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> associadas foram alteradas.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a network operation to retrieve the application, object and presence data specific to a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação de rede para recuperar os dados do aplicativo, do objeto e de presença específicos a uma instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" />.

trans-unit.source: The data retrieved is stored in a cache accessed by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> methods as well as the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os dados recuperados são armazenados em um cache acessado pelo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A> e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> métodos, bem como a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This method only needs to be used if the caller is not subscribed to the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método só precisa ser usado se o chamador não está inscrito especificado <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, ou <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.

trans-unit.source: This method blocks additional calls until the network operation is complete and cache has been updated.
trans-unit.target: Esse método bloqueia chamadas adicionais até que a operação de rede for concluída e o cache foi atualizado.

trans-unit.source: The caller is not required to sign in with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method or via a user interface in to complete this operation successfully.
trans-unit.target: O chamador não é necessário para entrar com o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> método ou por meio de uma interface do usuário para concluir esta operação com êxito.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: User-specified state object that is passed to the delegate when this method completes the operation.
trans-unit.target: Objeto de estado especificado pelo usuário passado para o representante quando este método conclui a operação.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a network operation to retrieve the application, object and presence data specific to a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação de rede para recuperar os dados do aplicativo, do objeto e de presença específicos a uma instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" />.

trans-unit.source: The data retrieved is stored in a cache accessed by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> methods as well as the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os dados recuperados são armazenados em um cache acessado pelo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A> e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> métodos, bem como a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.InternalRefreshData%2A> method only needs to be used if the caller is not subscribed to the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.InternalRefreshData%2A> método só precisa ser usado se o chamador não está inscrito especificado <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, ou <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.

trans-unit.source: This method blocks additional calls until the network operation is complete and cache has been updated.
trans-unit.target: Esse método bloqueia chamadas adicionais até que a operação de rede for concluída e o cache foi atualizado.

trans-unit.source: The caller is not required to sign in with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method or via a user interface in to complete this operation successfully.
trans-unit.target: O chamador não é necessário para entrar com o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> método ou por meio de uma interface do usuário para concluir esta operação com êxito.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="userToken" /> argument specifies <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O argumento <paramref name="userToken" /> especifica <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The prior <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataAsync(System.Object)" /> call has not yet completed.
trans-unit.target: A chamada <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataAsync(System.Object)" /> prévia ainda não foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: Signaled when the <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData" /> or <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataAsync(System.Object)" /> operation for the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance is completed.
trans-unit.target: Sinalizado quando a operação <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData" /> ou <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataAsync(System.Object)" /> para a instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> é concluída.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> a ser preenchido com dados.

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: O destino da serialização.

trans-unit.source: Populates the current <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance with the data obtained from the serialized source.
trans-unit.target: Popula a instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> atual com os dados obtidos da fonte serializada.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa uma instância <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> foi descartado.
